kpi_info.title: Discarded AAL5 CPCS-PDUs
kpi_info.use: Discarded AAL5 CPCS-PDUs. The number of discarded Common Part Convergence Sublayer Protocol Data Units. This counter indicates the discarding of received AAL5 CPCS-PDUs. AAL5 CPCS-PDUs are discarded because of an overflow of the receiving buffer, an overflow of the receiving FIFO, an overflow of the status queue or the received packet being larger than the maximum packet size. This counter does not include errors reported by counters INVALID_FIELDS M547C4, INCORRECT_FIELDS M547C5 and RSM_TIMER_EXP M547C6.
